.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IConventionForeignKey implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IReadOnlyAnnotatable, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionAnnotatable, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IReadOnlyForeignKey

Docs.summary: Represents a relationship where a foreign key property(s) in a dependent entity type reference a corresponding primary or alternate key in a principal entity type.

remarks.para: This interface is used during model creation and allows the metadata to be modified. Once the model is built, represents a read-only view of the same metadata.
See Model building conventions for more information and examples.
